version_description: Minor fixes and improvements

Thanks to all your great feedback and feature requests, we’ve added the ability for you to order checks. Now you can:

• Order checks quickly and easily
• Browse our entire catalog of check styles and accessories
• Personalize and customize your checks
• Track the status of your check order

This update also includes other minor fixes and improvements, and is fully supported by iOS 8 and 9. If you’re running iOS 7, you’ll need to update to the latest OS.

Can’t live without your BofA app? Please tell us why and rate it in the App Store.

Thanks to all your great feedback and feature requests, we’ve added the ability for you to order checks. Now you can:

• Order checks quickly and easily
• Browse our entire catalog of check styles
• Personalize and customize your checks
• Track the status of your check order

We’ve also fixed an issue with alerts that some users were experiencing.

This app is fully supported by iOS 8 and 9. If you’re running iOS 7, you’ll need to update to the latest OS.

Can’t live without your BofA app? Please tell us why and rate it in the App Store.

With our new redesigned app, it’s easier to find and use our most popular features. Plus, we’ve added some other requested enhancements:

•Simplified design for easier use and navigation
•Credit card rewards redemption options
•FICO® Score at no cost for consumer credit card customers
•Spanish language option

Let us know how we’re doing by rating the app in the App Store.

With our new redesigned app, it’s easier to find and use our most popular features. Plus, we’ve added some other requested enhancements:

•Simplified design for easier use and navigation
•Credit card rewards redemption options
•FICO® Score at no cost for consumer credit card customers
•Spanish language option
•Minor fixes

Let us know how we’re doing by rating the app in the App Store.

This app brings several new features and enhancements, including:

•New Help button to find answers quickly
•Preferred Rewards summary for enrolled customers
•Ability to schedule an appointment with a financial advisor, small business or home loan specialist of your choice
•BofA app icon now 3D Touch-enabled for iPhone 6S/6S+

Does the BofA app meet your banking needs? Let us know by rating it in the App Store.

You asked, we listened! Thanks to your feedback, now you can:
•Check balances without signing in using My Balance™
•View statements for checking, savings, credit card, auto and home loans
•Find BankAmeriDeals® near you to earn up to 15% cash back
•Deposit a check and immediately save, print or email a copy

How are we doing? Let us know by rating the app in the App Store®.

•Deposit a check and immediately save, print or email a copy

How are we doing? Let us know by rating the app in the App Store®.

We’ve made it easier to send and receive money with almost anyone, no matter where they bank.

• Easily send money using your phone’s contact list
• Request money from others
• Split the bill with friends
• Track your money requests

Try it today. Sign in and tap Transfers from the nav bar to get started.

How are we doing? Let us know by rating the app in the App Store®.

• Add debit and credit cards to your Apple Wallet
• Track your spending and set up a budget
• Enroll in Bill Pay

With our newest release, you can:
• Send money to friends using Zelle℠
• Update your email, phone number or mailing address
• Add accounts from other banks to pay your credit card bill (credit card only customers)
• Enroll your credit/debit cards in Masterpass™ and Visa Checkout® for easy online shopping
• Explore our products to find the right one for you

Please tell us what you think by rating the app in the App Store.

With this update, you can:
• View an optimized screen for iPhone X
• Schedule an appointment with the banker of your choice for notary and other banking needs
• Open a new checking account with just a few taps
• Donate to your favorite charity
• Order gift cards for your friends and family

J.D. Power awards first-ever Mobile App Certification to our app for providing “an outstanding mobile banking customer experience”.

The certification ensures our app provides:
• Ease of navigation and range of services
• Availability and clarity of key information
• Overall appearance of the app

J.D. Power 2018 Mobile App Certification Program recognition is based on successful completion of an audit and exceeding a customer experience benchmark through a survey of recent servicing interactions.

Thanks for using the Bank of America mobile app. This update includes:
• Ability to ask Siri for your account balances
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Our Mobile Banking App is certified by J.D. Power for providing “An Outstanding Mobile Banking Experience”.
For J.D. Power award information, visit jdpower.com.

Let us know how we’re doing by rating the app in the App Store.

• Easy Zelle setup to send/receive money with friends
• A one-stop car shopping tool to find and finance your next car
• Improved Small Business account opening, including the ability to save a credit card application
• Ability to add credit/debit cards to PayPal

Our Mobile Banking App is certified by J.D. Power for providing “An Outstanding Mobile Banking Experience”.
For J.D. Power award information, visit jdpower.com.

With our new Bank of America Digital Mortgage Experience™, you can:
• Get personalized loan terms, including flexible monthly payments and closing costs
• Lock in your rate
• Access lending specialists
• Track your loan status, view action items, as well as upload and eSign documents

Our Mobile Banking App is certified by J.D. Power for providing “An Outstanding Mobile Banking Experience.” For J.D. Power award information, visit jdpower.com.

How are we doing? Please rate the app in the App Store.

With this release, you can:
• Ask Erica, your virtual financial assistant, to find transactions, pay bills, and more
• Set rules to automatically categorize your expenses in the Spending & Budgeting tool
• Create savings goals for trips, school, and more
• Add an instantly approved credit card to your digital wallet immediately
• Enroll in Relationship Rewards for a wide range of small business benefits

How are we doing? Please rate the app.

You asked, we listened. Based on your feedback, this release includes:
• Improved Spending & Budgeting navigation, including a 12-month view of your income and cash flow
• Bug fixes and minor improvements

Please continue to share your feedback by rating the app.

• Bug fixes and minor improvements

Please continue to share your feedback by rating the app.
Bug fixes for iOS 12

You asked and we listened. Now you can:
• View, manage and cancel Zelle payments
• Track your rewards, deals and benefits throughout the year with My Rewards
• Choose how you get alerts including email, text and mobile notifications
• Explore, save and apply for new accounts using our improved shopping experience

Tell us what you think – rate the app today.

With this update, you can:
• Order foreign currency, track order progress, and get real-time status updates
• Place cash orders in advance – specifying the bills and coins you want – so it’s ready for pickup at the financial center
• View payee nicknames throughout Bill Pay

Our latest release includes:
• An updated look that is sleek and modern, without changing how you use the app
• New Erica insights, including proactive alerts for credit cardholders when their FICO® Score changes
•“Saved Items” from a financial center associate so you can conveniently research and open new accounts at home
• Easy access to add and manage the mobile wallets where your credit/debit cards are stored

With this release:
• Request personal credit card Balance Transfers and Direct Deposit Cash Advances
• Erica alerts you when your balance is trending low so you can take action
• Use your digital debit card immediately, before the card arrives in the mail
• Enroll in Preferred Rewards for additional rewards and benefits
• Small Businesses can now use Zelle to send, receive and request money

Note: All features are subject to eligibility requirements.

With this update, you’ll get:
• Proactive insights and guidance from Erica to help you stay on top of your finances
• All-new, optimized experience for iPad, including access to more features
• Enhanced Zelle design to help you verify your recipient’s contact info
• Quick tracking of your rewards, deals, and benefits with the My Rewards tile on My Dashboard
• Direct linking to the U.S. Trust app

Share your feedback by rating the app.

With this release:
• Cash Rewards credit card holders can select online shopping, dining, or another category each month as their 3% cash back choice
• Debit card holders can set daily limits for debit card purchases and ATM withdrawals
• Erica will notify you when you qualify for Preferred Rewards and allow you to easily enroll
• iPad users can choose Spanish as their language

We’ve updated the app with our new logo.

In this release:
• Cash Rewards credit card holders can select online shopping, dining, or another category each month as their 3% cash back choice
• Checking customers can view Bill Pay history, manage automatic Bill Pay plans, request eBills, and more
• Debit card holders can set daily limits for debit card purchases and ATM withdrawals
• Erica will notify you when you qualify for Preferred Rewards and allow you to easily enroll
• iPad users can choose Spanish as their language

We fixed the crash issue on Apple Watch.

In this release:
• Cash Rewards credit card holders can select online shopping, dining, or another category each month as their 3% cash back choice

• Erica will notify you when you qualify for Preferred Rewards and allow you to easily enroll
• iPad users can choose Spanish as their language
Bug fixes and minor improvements

• An updated look that is sleek and modern, without changing how you use the app

• An updated look that is sleek and modern, including a cleaner view of your Zelle® activity
• New Erica insights, including proactive alerts for credit cardholders when their FICO® Score changes
• “Saved Items” from a financial center associate so you can conveniently research and open new accounts at home

• Performance optimization and bug fixes

• New Erica insights, including notifications for merchant refunds
• Ability to submit merchant billing disputes and track status of claims
• Benefits OnLine® clients can now view their retirement account balances after they’ve linked from the website

• When you get a new card, Erica reminds you which companies have it on file so you can update your info

Our latest update lets you manage your everyday banking and view your Merrill investment accounts in one place:

• Monitor your portfolio's performance
• Search for quotes and view security details
• Access full account details, including holdings and activity

We’ve added more tools to help you manage, send and save money:
• Manage automatic payments with PayPlan to pay your BofA mortgage from your BofA or other bank account
• See friends who use Zelle® when sending money
• Get insights about available investment options from Erica when you make a large deposit

New features in this release include:

• Bank of America Life Plan® makes it easy to set and track short- and long-term financial goals, get personalized advice and more
• Guided experience to assist in activating and managing new debit and credit cards

We're always making improvements, so turn on automatic app updates to get the latest. Go to Settings > iTunes & App Store, and toggle on “App Updates".

In this release, we've made some minor enhancements and bug fixes.

We're always making improvements, so turn on automatic app updates to get the latest. Go to Settings > App Store, and toggle on “App Updates".

In this release:

• We've added a new search bar with enhanced functionality, making it easier to access the information and features you need

• In-process bill payments will stay in your outgoing payments list until they're delivered

• Erica provides proactive, personalized insights about available credit card rewards and a summary of total rewards each quarter

• We’ve moved your statement balance to the top of the credit card page

In this release:

• View your external accounts and net worth in “My Financial Picture”*
• Improved experience for Balance Transfer and Direct Deposit Cash Advance requests on your personal credit card

* Program enrollment in Online Banking required

In this release, our login screen gets a new look!

Be on the lookout for more enhancements to your banking experience later this year.
